column1: '''Sindarization''' was the process in which various [[Quenya]] names and words were changed to fit [[Sindarin]] rules and style.

column2: the [[Noldor]] and the [[Sindar]] began to find a medium of communication with one another.  In learning one another's languages
column3: the Noldor caught quickly onto Sindarin
column4: while the Sindar had extreme difficulty with Noldorin (Quenya).  This was the first step towards Sindarinization.

column1: The next step came quickly and absolutely.  [[Thingol|Elu Thingol]] learned of the [[Kinslaying at Alqualondë]]
column2: and was horrified and angered at the massacre of his kin.  He declared that the tongue of the kinslayers would not be spoken in his hearing
column3: and commanded all Sindar not to speak it or answer to it
column4: and to shun those who spoke it.  Therefore the Noldor were forced to speak Sindarin
column5: and it became their tongue in daily use.  Quenya stayed still in their lorebooks
column6: and was spoken in private among the lords of their kindred.
